input.sentences: when i got to the awards ceremony last week i arrived late .
they were already halfway through the event .
most of the soldiers had already left .
only a few were still there .
i only got to listen to one speaker .
output.sentences: A group of spectators look onward.
A captain fixes a yellow and grey flag with guards in the back of him.
The group of guards hold their guns against their chest.
The guards stand with stern facial expressions.
One of the guards starts to make a speech.
